reviewText: once again amazon comes through with exactly what someone thinks is 'impossible' to acquire at a price that is more than reasonable.  This was a gift for may 6mo old grand nice who loves the show.  not sure if this dvd is region free but works great in the US
It's the perfect DVD as it was for my 20 month old Grandson who is mesmerised by these strange little "hippy"-like characters. It's calming and is used a lot around bed time.
